meanings.sent1: She cartwheeled across the field with joy.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast cartwheeled gracefully on the mat.
meanings.sent3: The clown cartwheeled into the room, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts cartwheeled in excitement as she received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ribbons cartwheeled in the wind, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: I saw a cartwheeled in the park yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The cartwheeled was beautifully crafted and painted.
meanings.sent3: The children played with the cartwheeled in the playground.
meanings.sent4: The old cartwheeled held many memories of fun times.
meanings.sent5: The cartwheeled stood out among the other toys with its unique design.
